articles.title: Ucuz ChatGPT Aboneliği Geldi

articles.summary: OpenAI kullanıcıların uzun süredir beklediği daha uygun fiyatlı abonelik seçeneğini sonunda devreye aldı. Şirket aylık 20 dolarlık Plus paketine bütçesi yetmeyenler için geliştirdiği ChatGPT Go aboneliğini küresel ölçekte kullanıma sundu. articles.title: Yurt dışı ilaç listesi yenilendi: Fiyatlar güncellendi
articles.title_tr: Yurt dışı ilaç listesi yenilendi: Fiyatlar güncellendi
articles.summary: Resmi Gazete’de yayımlanan tebliğiyle yurt dışından temin edilen ilaçların Euro bazlı fiyatları güncellendi. Kalp, solunum, romatizma, bağışıklık ve kronik hastalıklarda kullanılan çok sayıda ilacın fiyatı yeniden belirlenirken, temininde güçlük yaşanan ilaçların bedelleri sağlık güvencesi kapsamında karşılanmaya devam edecek.

articles.title: Soğuk hava dalgası geliyor: Meteoroloji kar ve fırtına için uyardı
articles.title_tr: Soğuk hava dalgası geliyor: Meteoroloji kar ve fırtına için uyardı
articles.summary: Meteoroloji Genel Müdürlüğü, yağışlı ve soğuk havanın etkisini artıracağı duyurdu. Birçok bölgede kar ve karla karışık yağmur beklenirken, Karadeniz ve İç Anadolu’da yer yer kuvvetli yağışlar görülecek. Marmara ve Kuzey Ege’de fırtına, iç ve doğu kesimlerde ise buzlanma, don ve çığ riski öne çıkıyor.

articles.title: ALTINDA SON DURUM: Gram ve çeyrek altın kaç TL oldu? Altın fiyatları ne kadar? (17 Ocak 2026)
articles.title_tr: ALTINDA SON DURUM: Gram ve çeyrek altın kaç TL oldu? Altın fiyatları ne kadar? (17 Ocak 2026)
articles.summary: Altın fiyatları canlı ve güncel rakamlar merak ediliyor. ABD’de işsizlik maaşı başvurularının beklentilerin altında gelmesi ve Fed’e yönelik gevşeme beklentilerinin zayıflamasıyla altındaki yükseliş ivmesi yavaşlarken, gram altın hafta sonuna sakin ve kısmi düşüşle başladı. Peki, çeyrek altın fiyatları bugün ne kadar oldu? İşte 17 Ocak 2026 çeyrek, ons, gram ve yarım altın satış fiyatları...

articles.title: Battlefield 6 Update Improves Jet Combat And Knife Attacks
articles.title_tr: Battlefield 6 Update Improves Jet Combat And Knife Attacks
articles.summary: Earlier this week, Battlefield 6's Season 2 launch was pushed back to February 17 to give the development team more time to implement some needed changes. But that doesn't mean there won't be some improvements ahead of time. Electronic Arts has announced that Battlefield 6 Update 1.1.3.5 will arrive on Tuesday, January 20, and it's bringing some good news for anyone who wanted the jet combat to be more refined.Going forward, jet cannon damage against flying vehicles has been greatly reduced, and it will take "approximately 40% more hits" to blow targets out of the sky. However, the air radar that was previously announced will not be included in this update.Melee combat was also a priority for this update, which aims to improve "responsiveness, consistency, and sprint behavior for melee attacks, including knives and the sledgehammer." The Assault Ladder should also be more functional after this update, and the patch notes indicate that it has resolved some issues with the user interface and heads-up display in Redsec and Multiplayer, in addition to better stability for the Battle Royale and Gauntlet modes.Continue Reading at GameSpot
articles.summary_tr: Earlier this week, Battlefield 6's Season 2 launch was pushed back to February 17 to give the development team more time to implement some needed changes. But that doesn't mean there won't be some improvements ahead of time. Electronic Arts has announced that Battlefield 6 Update 1.1.3.5 will arrive on Tuesday, January 20, and it's bringing some good news for anyone who wanted the jet combat to be more refined.Going forward, jet cannon damage against flying vehicles has been greatly reduced, and it will take "approximately 40% more hits" to blow targets out of the sky. However, the air radar that was previously announced will not be included in this update.Melee combat was also a priority for this update, which aims to improve "responsiveness, consistency, and sprint behavior for melee attacks, including knives and the sledgehammer." The Assault Ladder should also be more functional after this update, and the patch notes indicate that it has resolved some issues with the user interface and heads-up display in Redsec and Multiplayer, in addition to better stability for the Battle Royale and Gauntlet modes.Continue Reading at GameSpot
articles.long_summary: Earlier this week, Battlefield 6's Season 2 launch was pushed back to February 17 to give the development team more time to implement some needed changes. But that doesn't mean there won't be some improvements ahead of time. Electronic Arts has announced that Battlefield 6 Update 1.1.3.5 will arrive on Tuesday, January 20, and it's bringing some good news for anyone who wanted the jet combat to be more refined.Going forward, jet cannon damage against flying vehicles has been greatly reduced,
